description: Listed Building Consent in connection with the demolition of 44 Queens Head Street and the boundary walls enclosing the property and the site of 145 Packington Street. Applicants Plan Nos; AR/EDB/14149 /1B  2B  3A  5B  6A  7B  and 81/79SL
decision_conditions: Islington Council objects to the proposal. The proposed demolition and associated works which require Listed Building Consent are associated with a scheme which involves the closure of Raleigh Street. Islington Council has refused planning permission for this development on the grounds that such a scheme, prior to agreement on a permanent traffic management scheme for the area, is premature. In these circumstances, any demolition works are also considered premature, as, without an agreed development, such demolition will result in a derelict site within a Conservation Area.
